name: Fire Trucks - Coloring Book
description:
Just move your finger and beautiful picture will be shown. It's so easy that each child can play with it. And it's so attractive that you can leave your baby with it for some time. The program develops motor skills and helps in early childhood development. The complexity and time can be tuned for your children depending on the size of the brush. Localized to 10 languages labels extend knowledge of your child.
The software is in line of our different coloring books, so you can find pictures that are interesting for your children personally.
